title: Balloonable
description: allows the entity to have a balloon attached and defines the conditions and events for the entity when is ballooned.

soft_distance.title: Soft Distance
soft_distance.description: Distance in blocks where the 'spring' effect lifts the entity.

max_distance.title: Max Distance
max_distance.description: Distance in blocks where the balloon breaks.

on_balloon.title: On Balloon
on_balloon.description: Event to call when the entity is ballooned.

on_unballoon.title: On Unballoon
on_unballoon.description: Event to call when the entity is unballooned.

mass.title: Mass
mass.description: Mass that the entity has when computing balloon pull forces.
